courseDetails.title: Diploma In Concrete Technology l Be a Concrete Technologist
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master l Concrete l Concrete Technology l Reinforced concrete l Concrete Mix Design l Cement l Concrete design l Civil
courseDetails.longDescription:
Syllabus of the Course

  1. Module-1 Concrete Ingredients Cement


Concrete Ingredients Cement –

Cement manufacturing process, steps to reduce carbon footprint, chemical composition and their importance, hydration of cement, types of cement. Testing of cement. Fine aggregate: Functions, requirement, Alternatives to River sand, M-sand introduction and manufacturing. Coarse aggregate: Importance of size, shape and texture. Grading and blending of aggregate. Testing on aggregate, requirement. Recycled aggregates Water – qualities of water. Chemical admixtures – plasticize-rs, accelerators, retarders and air entertaining agents. Mineral admixtures – Pozzolanic and cementitious materials, Fly ash, GGBS, silica fumes, Meta kaolin and rice husk-ash.


2. Module-2 Fresh Concrete Workability

Fresh Concrete Workability-

factors affecting work ability. Measurement of work ability–slump, Compaction factor and Vee-Bee Consistometer tests, flow tests. Segregation and bleeding. Process of manufacturing of concrete- Batching, Mixing, Transporting, Placing and Compaction. Curing – Methods of curing – Water curing, membrane curing, steam curing, accelerated curing, self- curing. Good and Bad practices of making and using fresh concrete and Effect of heat of hydration during mass concreting at project sites.


3. Module-3  Concrete Mix Proportioning

Concrete Mix Proportioning

Concept of Mix Design with and without admixtures, variables in proportioning and Exposure conditions, Selection criteria of ingredients used for mix design, Procedure of mix proportioning. Numerical Examples of Mix Proportioning using IS-10262:2019.


Concrete Technology

Concrete is a construction material composed of cement, fine aggregates (sand) and coarse aggregates mixed with water which hardens with time. Portland cement is the commonly used type of cement for production of concrete. Concrete technology deals with study of properties of concrete and its practical applications.


The main items we'll focus on in this course are:

  • Cement - Types & Roles of Different Ingredients

  • Manufacturing of Cement - Dry & Wet Process

  • The influence of admixtures and aggregates

  • Properties of fresh and hardened concrete

  • Work ability, settlement, bleeding and Segregation

  • Production of Concrete
targetAudiences: Civil Engineeering students in Final & Pre final year
Civil Engineering  Students  Apprearing for Interviews
Students Having Keen Intrest in Concrete Technology
Students Who are about to Join Engineering Domain

courseDetails.title: Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship
courseDetails.shortDescription: MTF Institute Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship, Intrapreneurship, Startup, MBA Business Module, Growth
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship


Program provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on higher & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry, and resident of the incubator "The Fintech House of Portugal".

MTF is present in 199 countries and has been chosen by more than 140,000 students.


The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship is a program designed to equip professionals with the advanced skills, strategies, and visionary thinking required to navigate the intricate world of modern corporate entrepreneurship. This course offers a deep exploration of the dynamic landscape of corporate innovation and entrepreneurship, covering an  array of topics that are crucial for individuals aiming to spearhead innovation, drive growth, and foster entrepreneurial cultures within established organizations.


Course Outline:

Understanding Modern Corporate Entrepreneurship:

The Role of Innovation: Analyzing the central role of innovation as the driving force behind corporate entrepreneurship and market disruption. Distinguishing Entrepreneurship from Intrapreneurship.

Comparative Analysis: Differentiating between external entrepreneurship and internal intrapreneurship, emphasizing their distinct attributes and applications.

Real-world Case Studies: Exploring diverse examples of both entrepreneurship and intrapreneurship to showcase their practical implications.


Exploring Intrapreneurship Types and Case Studies:

Categories of Intrapreneurial Endeavors: Investigating various forms of intrapreneurship, including product innovation and process enhancement.

Intrapreneurship Success Stories: Examining case studies of successful intrapreneurial initiatives within renowned organizations across industries.


Challenges of Cultivating Corporate Entrepreneurship:

Identifying Obstacles: Analyzing the inherent challenges that organizations face when attempting to foster a culture of corporate entrepreneurship.

Strategies for Overcoming Challenges: Developing proactive strategies to address resistance to change, risk aversion, and organizational inertia.


Taxonomy of Intrapreneurial Personalities:

Intrapreneurial Archetypes: Defining different profiles of intrapreneurs, including idea generators, project champions, and disruptive catalysts.

Nurturing Intrapreneurial Talent: Strategies for recognizing and nurturing individuals with intrapreneurial potential within the workforce.


Nurturing and Leading Intrapreneurs:

Fostering a Supportive Ecosystem: Creating an environment that encourages creativity, experimentation, and calculated risk-taking.

Empowerment Strategies: Providing intrapreneurs with resources, autonomy, and mentorship to propel their innovative endeavors.


Becoming an Intrapreneurial Leader:

Personal Transformation: Cultivating the mindset and skillset necessary for individuals to lead with intrapreneurial spirit within their roles.

Influence and Impact: Strategies for inspiring teams, driving change, and championing innovation from within.


Diverse Models of Corporate Entrepreneurship:

Frameworks for Integration: Exploring a spectrum of models and frameworks organizations can adopt to infuse entrepreneurial principles into their DNA.

Case Studies: Analyzing the practical implementation of various models in successful corporate entrepreneurship initiatives.


Unlocking Growth with Strategic Innovation:

Growth Hacking Strategies: Delving into the innovative techniques and agile approaches that drive rapid business expansion.

Engines of Growth: Investigating the mechanisms that fuel accelerated growth in startups and established enterprises.

Market Expansion Theories and Growth Matrices:


Market Penetration vs. Expansion:

Exploring market expansion theories and their pivotal role in strategic decision-making for growth.

Growth Matrix Applications: Applying growth matrices to identify growth opportunities, allocate resources, and diversify product portfolios.


Corporate Venturing and Innovation Ecosystems:

Corporate Venturing Strategies: Understanding the concept of corporate venturing and its impact on driving innovation through external partnerships.

Navigating Innovation Ecosystems: Examining how organizations can collaborate with startups, academia, and research centers to fuel innovation.


Importance for Companies and Employees:

The landscape of modern business is marked by rapid technological advancements, evolving customer preferences, and dynamic competitive pressures. In such an environment, corporate entrepreneurship stands as a beacon of resilience and adaptability for organizations. The Comprehensive Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship Excellence serves as a critical learning pathway for companies seeking to stay at the forefront of innovation and leverage entrepreneurial agility to secure sustainable growth.


For Companies:

Cultivating Innovation Culture: The course equips companies with the tools and methodologies to foster an innovation-driven culture, enabling them to stay ahead of disruption and drive continuous improvement.

Seizing New Opportunities: Organizations that embrace corporate entrepreneurship are better positioned to identify emerging market trends, seize untapped opportunities, and create innovative solutions that resonate with customers.

Navigating Disruption: The skills gained from this course empower companies to navigate disruptive forces by fostering an agile mindset, encouraging creative problem-solving, and capitalizing on change.


For Employees:

Career Acceleration: Individuals equipped with corporate entrepreneurship skills become invaluable assets to their organizations. They are poised to take on leadership roles, drive strategic initiatives, and contribute significantly to their companies' growth trajectories.

Entrepreneurial Skillset: Learning the art of corporate entrepreneurship imparts a versatile skillset that transcends job titles. Professionals gain the ability to identify market gaps, propose innovative solutions, and drive change even from within established hierarchies.

Personal Branding: Embracing corporate entrepreneurship fosters a reputation for being a proactive, innovative, and dynamic professional. This can open doors to exciting career opportunities and help individuals stand out in competitive job markets.


Leveraging Corporate Entrepreneurship for Career and Business Ventures:

The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship  not only equips individuals with skills to thrive within organizations but also empowers them to embark on entrepreneurial journeys of their own.


Career Advancement: Professionals who demonstrate a keen understanding of corporate entrepreneurship principles are more likely to be considered for leadership positions. Their ability to drive innovation and adapt to changing business landscapes makes them indispensable assets to any organization.


Entrepreneurial Endeavors: Armed with the mindset and skillset of corporate entrepreneurship, individuals are well-equipped to transition from being employees to becoming successful entrepreneurs. The course nurtures the spirit of calculated risk-taking, resource optimization, and strategic thinking – all essential components for entrepreneurial success.


The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship Excellence offers a transformative learning experience that bridges the gap between traditional business approaches and the demands of a rapidly evolving market. It empowers companies to become innovation powerhouses and individuals to carve out exceptional career trajectories or entrepreneurial journeys. Enroll in this program to embark on a transformative journey that merges innovation, leadership, and business acumen into a potent catalyst for growth and success.

courseDetails.title: The Practical BPMN 2.0 Master Class
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn to craft expressive BPMN flow charts through dozens of real-world business cases and exercises!
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course will get you from zero to hero in BPMN 2.0. I will teach you how to apply all the fundamental BPMN elements with the help of processes from exiting business use cases. 

We will take a look at:

  • An industrial production processes of a private space ship manufacturer

  • The compliance procedures of a holiday visa application to an island

  • A digital transformation process in the health & beauty industry.

  • A process of manual tasks applied as work instruction in the retail industry

  • And many more


Each of these real life scenarios will then be concluded by an exercise that enables you to try out the freshly learned BPMN elements yourself. 

For this we use Cawemo, a free, lightweight and very user friendly BPMN web modeler that also allows you to share your process models.

In the last section you model completely independently. You can send me the result to review! I am happy to provide you with personal feedback and advice on your final piece of work!


Of course, before every exercise and practical, real business use case I will introduce you every new BPMN element through a brief theory parts. In these theory parts you will learn about the following BPMN Elements

  • Tasks
  • Sequence Flows
  • Pools & Lanes
  • Exclusive Gateway
  • Parallel Gateway
  • Inclusive Gateway
  • Event Based Gateway
  • Start and End Event
  • Message Event
  • Timer Event
  • Conditional Event
  • Link Event
  • Attached Events
  • Collapsed Pools 
  • Sub Processes 
  • Call Activities 
  • Data Object 
  • Data Store 

All of these elements will the be applied to a practical real business process.
targetAudiences: Anyone who wants to learn BPMN 2.0 from scratch
Anyone who wants to refresh his or her knowledge in BPMN 2.0
Anyone who is in touch with business process management
Anyone who wants to pursue a career in business analysis and consulting
Any consultant, business analyst or process owner who wants to optimize processes
Anyone who wants to understand the power of process management

courseDetails.title: CDPSE Course 101 - Certified Data Privacy Solutions Engineer
courseDetails.shortDescription: CDPSE, Certified Data Privacy Solutions Engineer, Privacy Governance, ISACA, Risk Management,Data Lifecycle, Exam prep.
courseDetails.longDescription:
CDPSE Course 101 - Your Gateway to Becoming a Certified Data Privacy Solutions Engineer

In today's data-driven world, protecting sensitive information and ensuring data privacy has never been more critical. With the ever-increasing number of data breaches and regulatory requirements, organizations are actively seeking professionals who can bridge the gap between data privacy and technology. In this 101 exam preparation course, we will explore CDPSE syllabus and topics explaining and how it can be your gateway to becoming a certified expert in data privacy solutions.

The Certified Data Privacy Solutions Engineer (CDPSE) credential is a globally recognized certification designed for professionals who wish to build a career at the intersection of data privacy and technology. It's offered by ISACA, a leading global organization known for its certifications in information systems, security, and governance. CDPSE focuses on the practical application of data privacy solutions, making it a valuable credential for anyone involved in securing and managing sensitive data.

Data privacy professionals are in high demand across various industries. Holding a CDPSE certification will set you apart in the job market and open up numerous career opportunities.

With the ever-evolving data protection regulations, organizations need experts who can ensure compliance. CDPSE provides the skills to navigate these complex laws effectively.

The course equips you with a holistic understanding of data privacy, covering not only compliance but also the technical and operational aspects of data protection.

ISACA is a well-established professional organization, and CDPSE connects you to a vast network of data privacy and technology professionals worldwide.

CDPSE is a valuable certification for a wide range of professionals, including:

· IT and security professionals

· Data privacy officers and managers

· Compliance officers

· Data analysts and engineers

· Legal and audit professionals

· Anyone interested in a career in data privacy

The Certified Data Privacy Solutions Engineer (CDPSE) course is a golden opportunity for individuals looking to excel in the field of data privacy solutions. As organizations continue to grapple with data privacy challenges, CDPSE-certified professionals will be at the forefront of ensuring data protection, compliance, and innovation.

By enrolling in CDPSE Course 101, you're taking the first step toward becoming a sought-after expert in data privacy solutions. It's not just a course; it's a career investment that will open doors to a world of opportunities and help you make a significant impact in the data privacy landscape. So, are you ready to embark on this exciting journey to become a Certified Data Privacy Solutions Engineer? Your path to success starts here!

In this 101 course, I would like to teach the 5 major topics and 1 practice test:

1. Enhancing Privacy Governance through Effective Risk Management

2. Collaborative Privacy Practices: Bridging the Gap Between Privacy and Cybersecurity

3. Measuring Privacy Success: Metrics and Reporting in Privacy Governance

4. Designing a Robust Privacy Architecture: Safeguarding Data in a Connected World

5. Navigating the Data Lifecycle: A Comprehensive Approach to Privacy Management" &

Practice test

To pass of this practice test course, you must score at least 70% on the practice test.

In every question, I explained why the answer is correct!

Good Luck ! & Thank you once again !

Interested students to learn about the concepts of Certified Data Privacy Solutions Engineer for the certifcation preparation

courseDetails.title: How to Find The Perfect Virtual Assistant For Your Business
courseDetails.shortDescription: 2xYou Remote Team Series
courseDetails.longDescription:
Hiring can be a scary thing, isn’t it?

When you post a job post whether online or in the newspapers, you will never really know who you’re reeling in.

Are you getting someone who is actually skilled in what you need? Or are you simply getting someone who is just applying for anything but doesn’t really know what they’re doing?

In this course, we will teach you how to create job postings that will not only get you the best applicants, but will also filter itself to make sure you get them. We will teach you our secret of hiring an employee for the long run, where you don’t have to hire and fire after a few months. It all boils down to one simple trick that works every time.

You'll learn:

courseDetails.title: Public Speaking for NGOs, NonProfits & Volunteers
courseDetails.shortDescription: Your Idea Worth Spreading
courseDetails.longDescription:
NGOs, NonProfits, and Volunteer Run Organizations do some of the most rewarding work for amazing causes.  Unfortunately, they can be under funded, and resources are usually stretched to the breaking point.

Conversely, in more established charities, politics and precedent can discourage the impact of newer leaders and initiatives. 

Establishing yourself as a thought leader outside the walls of your charity is one tool that innovators use to leverage the vehicle of TEDx – and raise everyone in their organization by going outside the walls to spread the impact of the ideas behind your charity. 

This course will give you options to get either invited – or accepted – to make your ideas heard on the TEDx stage.  It features several examples from the 300+ case studies of BeTheTalk podcast, several are from the non-profit world.

You will learn:

WHY TED?

  • #1 ENEMY to an effective TEDx Talk

  • How to Anticipate Compassion Fatigue

  • Make them CURIOUS not indignant

  • Use TEDx Talks to fundraise & increase resources

  • And much more!

Many people want to be able to give TEDx talks. The TED logo is a symbol of prestige and credibility in a world that values quality and authority. It will be a mark of a speaker's expertise and clout for their entire careers. It is not easy to get a TED or TEDx talk. Many applicants wonder how they can crack the code because of the rigorous application process and low acceptance rates.

We often think of TED talks as being for great speakers. While the ability to engage an audience is a key qualification, organizers are more concerned with why one speaker is chosen over another.

Staff at NGO/NonProfits

courseDetails.title: Complete JavaScript, jQuery and React Bootcamp - Hands-On
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn to Harness the Power of JavaScript, jQuery and React to Build Stunning Front-End User Interfaces.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the JavaScript, jQuery, and React Bootcamp. In this course you will learn how to use JavaScript along with two powerful JavaScript libraries to build dynamic, interactive web pages. We start with introducing students to the document object model (DOM) which defines the logical structure of HTML documents. From there we dive into JavaScript to demonstrate various methods in which DOM elements can be manipulated to add interactivity to static components. The JavaScript section starts right from the basics, which includes JavaScript placement, and data output. From there we move on to variable declaration, arithmetic operations, operator precedence, data types, and objects. Once the foundations are covered, we move on to more complex operations using Arrays, Conditional Statements, JavaScript comparison operators, booleans and loops. Here students will learn to unleash the true power of JavaScript to render different outcomes based on user interaction. We will explore the use of functions to efficiently handle repetitive tasks and JavaScript events to handle output based on actions and occurrences. The section will conclude with a hands-on project where students will implement their knowledge to build a web based photo gallery and background color changer.

In the second section of this course, students will learn to work with jQuery - a powerful JavaScript library designed to simplify HTML DOM tree traversal and manipulation. jQuery is ultra lightweight, feature rich, and cross-platform compatible. It’s one of the easiest libraries to work with for building out JavaScript features on an HTML web page. jQuery is excellent for event handling, CSS animations, and Ajax integration for asynchronous UI state changes. Similar to the JavaScript section, the jQuery module begins with the foundations. This includes instructions on embedding jQuery to a web page, and an intro into jQuery syntax. Students will learn to work with jQuery selectors, events, and toggling. From there we dive into animations using fades, slides, and the jQuery animate function. Students also learn about chaining, draggable objects, callback functions, the get content method, toggling classes, and filtering. By the end of the jQuery module, you will know how to build stunning animated web pages with ease.

In the last section of this course we’ll explore React - a cutting edge JavaScript library for building state-of-the art user interface components. You’ve likely seen React in action on some of the hottest web apps developed by fortune 500 companies. For example, Netflix, Facebook, and AirBnB all use React for their front-end UI. As a matter of fact, React was developed by Meta alongside a community of independent developers. Until this day, React remains free and open-source so it has plenty of support and documentation. Unlike jQuery which interacts with the document object model directly, React works through a “virtual” DOM. React is unaware of changes made to the DOM outside of React and determines updates based on its own internal representations. React is best for creating reusable code blocks for UI components and layering them on top of each other to minimize the number of times the DOM needs to be re-rendering on state changes.

The React section of this course starts off with a hands-on project where you’ll learn how to work with functional React components, props, Callback functions, OnClick Events, and the React State hook to build a fully functional calculator. From there we will dive into project number two, where you will build a connect-4 clone. Here we will cover more intermediate concepts including passing props, destructuring, passing arguments to click events, various styling methods, and handling callbacks. You will also learn about the React key property, React lifecycle events, and conditional rendering. By the end you will have built a complete multi and single player connect-4 game board with built-in AI capabilities.

In the final section of the course we further unleash the power of React by building out a complete e-commerce site with multiple product categories, a product showcase, shopping cart feature, and much more. Here, we introduce a number of integral new concepts including: JSON server, Fetch API, and installing React router. These essential building blocks will be used to render the product categories, style the product list, and configure the product details page. From there we dive into styled components, refactoring the shop layout, and exploring the concept of “context” in React. In the final stages of the project students will configure the shopping cart basket, and the checkout feature. We will also implement a product search feature, followed by in-depth exercises on validating input forms in React.

As you can see this course covers a tremendous bit of ground. Best of all it’s co-authored by Tim Maclachlan - a renowned senior full-stack developer with over 20 years of commercial development experience. As a multi-faceted developer, Tim specializes in algorithmic, analytical and mobile development. To date, he’s written hundreds of applications and worked in a number of industries from commercial aviation and military, to banking and finance. Tim has a genuine passion for teaching others how to become better coders and looks forward to interacting with his students.

With that said, we hope you’re just as excited about this course as we are, if so - hit that enroll button and let’s get started.
targetAudiences: Students interested in working with Popular JavaScript Libraries
Students interested in Building Interactive UI Components using React and jQuery
Students interested in Mastering Front-End Development using JavaScript

courseDetails.title: Dart Mastery - Become a Dart Master From Zero to Hero
courseDetails.shortDescription: Getting Started with Dart: A Journey from Novice to Expert
courseDetails.longDescription:
Course Description: Are you eager to become a skilled Dart programmer and create powerful, efficient, and scalable applications? Look no further! Welcome to the "Dart Mastery - Zero to Hero Training Course," where you'll embark on an exciting journey to master Dart programming from the ground up.

Dart is a versatile and user-friendly programming language designed for building cross-platform applications, making it an ideal choice for web, mobile, and desktop development. Whether you're a beginner with little coding experience or an experienced developer looking to add a new language to your skillset, this comprehensive course is tailored for you.

The course is thoughtfully divided into ten carefully curated sections to ensure a smooth and progressive learning experience. Here's what you can expect in each section:


Section-1: Welcome In this introductory section, you'll get a warm welcome and an overview of what to expect throughout the course. We'll set the stage for your exciting journey into the world of Dart programming.


Section-2: Introduction Before diving into the technical aspects, you'll learn about the history and features of Dart. Get acquainted with the language's unique characteristics, tools, and ecosystem.


Section-3: Builtin Data Types Building a strong foundation is crucial, and this section will focus on Dart's builtin data types. You'll master essential concepts such as variables, lists, maps, and strings.


Section-4: Conditional Statements Explore the power of decision-making with conditional statements. You'll learn how to create branching logic and control the flow of your programs.


Section-5: Iterative Statements Unleash the potential of loops and iteration in this section. You'll gain expertise in repeating tasks efficiently and handling complex scenarios.


Section-6: Functions Understand the essence of functions in Dart. Learn how to create reusable code blocks and harness the full potential of modular programming.


Section-7: Exception Handling Error handling is a critical aspect of any robust application. Discover how to gracefully handle exceptions and prevent unexpected crashes.


Section-8: Object Oriented Programming Dive into the world of object-oriented programming (OOP) in Dart. You'll master classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism, and encapsulation.


Section-9: Functional Programming Expand your programming paradigm with functional programming concepts. Learn about higher-order functions, closures, and functional techniques.


Section-10: Collection Explore Dart's powerful collection libraries and how they can enhance the efficiency and performance of your applications.

Throughout the "Dart Mastery - Zero to Hero Training Course," you'll find a perfect balance between theory and hands-on exercises. Our instructor, an experienced Dart developer, will guide you through real-world examples and projects, ensuring you gain practical experience and confidence in your coding abilities.


By the end of this course, you'll emerge as a Dart expert, fully equipped to tackle a wide range of software development challenges. So, are you ready to unlock your potential and elevate your programming skills to new heights? Enroll now and embark on this transformative learning adventure!
targetAudiences: Computer Science or IT students
People who want to learn cross-platform mobile applications.
Beginner developers
